price: Indyarya, abanyengeterewe mu mutima n’indwara yo kwamana amakenga, hamwe rero na ba gateranya barazwa ishinga no gukwiragiza ibihuha mu gisagara ca Madina, mu ntumbero yo gutera akaguma, ni ukuri nibatateshwa bagata, Tuzokugomorera kuri bo maze ubomore, hanyuma ntibazokumarana muri nya gisagara kiretse akanya gato;
arabic: ۞ لَّئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡمُرۡجِفُونَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَنُغۡرِيَنَّكَ بِهِمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيهَآ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

meta.transliteration: la-in lam yantahi al-munāfiqūna wa-alladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal-mur'jifūna fī al-madīnati lanugh'riyannaka bihim thumma lā yujāwirūnaka fīhā illā qalīlan
translations: We will let you overpower them
We will let you overpower them
